column2: PY-29051: Fix breakpoints on lines that throw exceptions

column3: @Elizaveta239 Please take a look. I think this is a pretty serious issue.
@Elizaveta239 Did you get a chance to look at this one?
Hi! Yes, it's already tested and reviewed and it will be included into one of the upcoming PyCharm 2018.2 EAPs.
